name: Jewelers Mutual Group, Inc.
description: Jewelers Mutual Group, Inc. is the only insurance company dedicated exclusively to the jewelry industry. Founded in 1913, the company is headquartered in Neenah, Wisconsin, and has built a reputation for providing tailored insurance products and services to jewelers and consumers alike. Jewelers Mutual specializes in insuring jewelry, watches, and precious gemstones, offering protection against theft, loss, and damage. The company offers a range of insurance solutions, including personal jewelry insurance that covers items lost or damaged outside of the home. With a commitment to exceptional customer service, Jewelers Mutual has cultivated strong relationships within the jewelry community, providing resources and support to help jewelers manage risk and protect their businesses. The company also emphasizes education, offering various tools and materials to help jewelers understand insurance and risk management. In addition to insurance, Jewelers Mutual Group fosters a community through its engagement with industry professionals and participation in trade shows and events. By focusing on the unique needs of the jewelry industry, Jewelers Mutual continues to be a trusted partner for jewelers and consumers alike, ensuring that the treasures they cherish are always protected.

seo.meta_title: Jewelers Mutual Group | Insurance for Jewelers and Consumers
seo.meta_description: Jewelers Mutual Group provides specialized insurance solutions exclusively for the jewelry industry, protecting precious items and supporting jewelers with risk management resources.

faq.question: What does Jewelers Mutual specialize in?
faq.answer: Jewelers Mutual specializes in insurance products tailored for the jewelry industry, including coverage for theft, loss, and damage.

faq.question: Where is Jewelers Mutual headquartered?
faq.answer: Jewelers Mutual is headquartered in Neenah, Wisconsin, USA.

faq.question: What types of insurance does Jewelers Mutual offer?
faq.answer: Jewelers Mutual offers jewelry insurance, business insurance, and personal jewelry insurance.
